row.entry: Deployment of JetStream without enabling hugepages and NUMA variables.
Deployment of JetStream with enabling hugepages variable only.
JetStream deployment should be successful along with hugepages deployment.
Deployment of JetStream with enabling both hugepages and NUMA variables
JetStream deployment should be successful along with hugepages and NUMA deployment.
Deployment of JetStream along with hugepages and not specifying the value for the flavor_name in the .ini file.
The script should exit with an error.
Deployment of JetStream along with hugepages and not specifying the values for the hpgsize and hpgnum in the .ini file.
The script should exit with an error.
Creation of a test instance in Overcloud with Hugepages flavor
An instance should be created without any error
Reduction of Hugepages number in one of the compute nodes after creation of Hugepages test instance
HugePages_Free should be less than Hugepages_Total
Run Jetstream script with enable_hugepages set to true and run_sanity set to true in the settings file
